item.description:
HAL 2000 has graciously invited us to his house for a Luau Party. Please wear your favorite Hawaiian Shirt. This is a potluck barbecue, so please bring something to share. HAL 2000 has some lawn chairs but could use some more, so please bring your lawn chairs. Entertainment includes volleyball and board games.

Directions:
From Nashua a 15-20 Minute Sail
On Route 3 take Route 111 west to Pepperell
Turn left @ Route 111/Hollis Street
White House/White Fence 0.2 miles on the starboard side
Please do not park on the street.
Pull in and park on the grass under the trees

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: Hal's 2009 Luau Party
